title: Alerts
name: 01-alerts
contents:
A basic alert-box can be created with minimal markup.

Alert text goes here.

<!-- Alerts --><div class="alert-box success">    <p>Alert text goes here.</p></div>

title: Buttons
name: 01-buttons
contents:
A basic button can be created with minimal markup.

Link Button
<!-- Anchors (links) --><a href="#" class="button">Link Button</a><!-- Buttons (actions) --><button class="button">Action Button</button>
